data.text: @ocmousetrap @OffcolorBrewing 🖕Nazis. The great thing about you POS beer Nazis is that we can also boycott buying your piss in stores and restaurants.
@AmplifiedK @ocmousetrap Why? This is a decision that follows zero science or data and only segregates people. Please explain.
@patorioto @amfonte @ocmousetrap @OffcolorBrewing Ah only the vaccinated can give each other covid? One of you please explain how this makes sense.
@amfonte @ocmousetrap @OffcolorBrewing It’s the method that makes most sense yet so few places seem to do it
@ocmousetrap @OffcolorBrewing Coming to Chicago in a few days. Can’t wait to visit!
@ocmousetrap @OffcolorBrewing Finally! Some common sense… thank you for not dropping everything all together.
